system.summary: Repair a structure and make it more resistant to destruction.

description.value:
So long as you have relevant materials, you can reinforce a structure against damage at a rate of 10sqft per minute. Each Rest Action you spend working on it, make an Intelligence (Craft) check.

  • If the structure has hit points, restore them by the result of the check - 10.
  • If the structure has a DC to destroy it, take the result of the check - 5. If that is higher than the DC, that becomes the new DC to destroy it.
